Title: Time of Your Death
Plot: A high roller who spent the night with a woman he had just met is found dead on the loading dock of the casino where he was staying. The investigation reveals that the victim won $10,000 in a pool game and was an assistant to a respected movie producer.
GuestStars: Louise Lombard, Wallace Langham, John Michael Higgins, Will Yun Lee, Kyle Howard, Julie Benz, Kenny Johnson, Andy Umberger, Archie Kao, Paul Carafotes, David Berman, Jocko Sims, Ethan Erickson, Shawn Michael Patr
